statements.select: SELECT DISTINCT di.DistrictID ID, di.Name, di.pinyin, di.lat, di.lon FROM interestPlace a INNER JOIN Interest i ON i.ID = a.IID AND i.released = 1 AND i.[Type] = 1 INNER JOIN DestDB..DistrictInfo di ON di.DistrictID = a.districtID and di.Released = 1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT ipid, COUNT(1) c FROM InterestHotelRel ihr WHERE STATE > 10 GROUP BY ipid ) ihrc ON ihrc.ipid = a.id WHERE a.Released = 1
